title: Is Pvp.net down??
body: Every time I start league game crashes before anything even pops up, I tried reinstalling same issue

replies.body:
Do you mean that the PVP.net kernel patcher has stopped working?
I had the same problem when I updated the new windows 10 update.
I solved it by running it as administrator.
I'd like to help but need some more information.  What do you mean exactly by crashing?  When is it happening or what do you see?  Any error messages?  Any extra detail could help, let me know!
